definitions.title: n.pr
definitions.body: (v. Sta:§ 308 d. 1; 342 d. 2; Morgenl. Forsch. 215)—might in several cases, e.g. Ge 35:16, be [[אֶפְרָת]] + [[ה]] loc., but v. Ru 4:11; —

definitions.title: 1. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: place near Bethel, where Rachel died & was buried Ge 35:16, Ge 35:19, Ge 48:7 ([[אֶפְרָת]] only Ge 48:7 where [[ה]] perh. dropped on acc. of [[ה]] following (Ol); in last two passages [[הוא בית לחם]] is a gloss, v. Di; cf. 1Sa 10:2).
id., a name of Bethlehem Mic 5:1, Ru 4:11; cf. perh. [[כָּלֵב אֶפְתָָה]] 1Ch 2:24 (LXX h\=lqen Xale\b ei)v )Efra/qa).
id. Ps 132:6, perh. applied to district where Kirjath Jearim lay, on the border of Judah & Benjamin, cf. De Che.

definitions.title: 4. n.pr.f.
definitions.body: [[אֶפְרָת]] name given to wife of Caleb 1Ch 2:19 = [[אֶפְרָתָָח]] v:1Ch 2:50, 1Ch 4:4.
